about_the_game:
It is so hard for one to pretend to be a normal man, and those wings under one's shirt are not making it any better. But he has to be patient if he wants to play. And he loves to play so much! He may lend you his nimbus, if you want it. He will teach you the correct tactics of the game, so it can help you to score an incredible goal… ohh, in sense to build a monopoly! Then the victory will come to you itself. Here are new dice, 100 gold and 50.000 chips for you. They will come in handy.

After buying this content, you get to your collection of characters "Player number 10", "Dice number 10", as well as 100 gold and 50,000 chips.

After buying this content, you get to your collection of characters "Player number 10", "Dice number 10", as well as 100 gold and 50,000 chips.
